00069 class SIM_API cPar : public cObject
00070 {
00071     friend class cComponent;
00072   public:
00073     enum Type {
00074         BOOL = 'B',
00075         DOUBLE = 'D',
00076         LONG = 'L',
00077         STRING = 'S',
00078         XML = 'X'
00079     };
00080 
00081   private:
00082     cComponent *ownercomponent;
00083     cParImpl *p;
00084 
00085   private:
00086     // private constructor -- only cComponent is allowed to create parameters
00087     cPar() {ownercomponent = NULL; p = NULL;}
00088     // internal, called from cComponent
00089     void init(cComponent *ownercomponent, cParImpl *p);
00090     // internal
00091     void moveto(cPar& other);
00092     // internal: called each time before the value of this object changes.
00093     void beforeChange();
00094     // internal: called each time after the value of this object changes.
00095     void afterChange();
00096 
00097   public:
00098     // internal: applies the default value if there is one
00099     void acceptDefault();
00100     // internal
00101     void setImpl(cParImpl *p);
00102     // internal
00103     cParImpl *impl() const {return p;}
00104     // internal
00105     cParImpl *copyIfShared();
00106 
00107   public:
00111     virtual ~cPar();
00112 
00116     virtual const char *getName() const;
00117 
00122     virtual std::string info() const;
